  <img src="img\Heybox.png" height=180></img>
  <h1>小黑盒 - 深色主題</h1>
  <a href="https://github.com/Gholts/HeyboxDarkTheme/raw/main/HeyboxDarkMode.user">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/%E7%9B%B4%E6%8E%A5%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%9D%E9%80%8F%E9%81%8E-Stylus-285959.svg" alt="直接安裝透過 Stylus"></a>

<a href="https://userstyles.world/style/180/gog-com-dark-theme">
<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=%23193652&label=UserStyles.world&query=total_installs&suffix=%20installs&url=https%3A%2F%2Fuserstyles.world%2Fapi%2Fstyle%2Fstats%2F20527&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="Install through UserStyles.world" title="Install through UserStyles.world"></a>

<br>
(要安裝這個樣式，你需要安裝  <a href="https://github.com/openstyles/stylus#stylus">Stylus 擴充功能</a>)
</div>

## 📋 TODO
  - [ ] 修復 bug (你告訴我)
  - [ ] 增加對「创作者中心」的深色支援
  - [ ] 增加對「最近消息」和「私訊」的深色支援

## 🤝 參與貢獻
  1. 歡迎 Fork 專案倉庫, 歡迎點擊 stars
  2. 建立特性分支 (`git checkout -b feature/improvement`)
  3. 提交修改 (`git commit -m 'Add some feature'`)
  4. 推播分支 (`git push origin feature/improvement`)
  5. 建立 Pull Request
